org.datavec.dataframe.api

Interface NumericColumn

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Column
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DoubleColumn, FloatColumn, IntColumn, LongColumn, ShortColumn

    public interface NumericColumn
extends Column
    Functionality common to all numeric column types
